website_summaries.verdict: The overwhelming number of positive feedback has proven that the Asics Gel Kayano 25 was satisfactory to most users. A few found the shoe expensive, but a lot of runners were happy with the shoe’s cushioning, stability and versatility. Overall, most purchasers have been enjoying using the Kayano 25 and they're satisfied with their purchase.
pros: The Kayano 25 is very comfortable to wear even for long hours, said several users
A few lauded the shoe’s appealing design and color options
Some purchasers appreciated the stability features of the Asics Gel Kayano 25
The underfoot cushioning system was appreciated by many people
A couple of reviewers commended the shoe’s roomy toe box which allows natural toe-splay
Some runners noted that this running shoe has an impressive fit
some used this version for casual walks and gym workouts
According to some user reviews, the shoe is durable
The Kayano 25 is also available in wide width option
cons: A couple of wearers experienced heel blister and ankle pain with the Asics Gel Kayano 25

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the UK 9.5 and the 10 ( I’m usually a ten but have found ASICS a little on the large side before) the 10 fit perfect. I have Plantar Fasciitis and these are very comfortable especially if you use a Physix Gear Orthotic insole.
customer_reviews.author: Betch

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: Good cushioning on these, bought them for the knee pain. The sizing is small - go one up from usual in euro sizing, or fit at a store first. The look is a bit ugly in some colors, but white is good enough for running.
customer_reviews.author: Eire I Am

customer_reviews.title: Asics Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Asics Gel-Kayano 25 running shoe is a well made and comfortable trainer which provides a good cushioned landing with each step. They are more expensive than some running shoes but as the saying goes " you get what you pay for ". I have had this type of running shoe previously so I knew what I was getting and I am not disappointed. A good experience from seller with no difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Foot Tapper

customer_reviews.title: Standard quality
customer_reviews.text: You know what to get with these trainers if used before. I am a standard size eight but ordered these in a nine to allow for feet swelling. If like me don't go any higher in size as I have a size nine and half sitting in a box at home, wore them once and they felt like clown's shoes when running.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned regarding the sizing after reading some of the reviews. I needed a trainer that would be comfortable and not too tight across the centre of the shoe. I was only going to use the trainer for walking my 10k steps per day. Length wise they were spot on a size 8, and although snug for the width they are perfectly comfortable, loads of cushioning on the sole. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase, I love these comfy trainers
customer_reviews.text: My second pair- I had bought an earlier model a couple of years ago. These trainers are so comfortable, I don’t have to wear them in. They provide good cushioning and foot support and comfy for long walks as well as casual wear. Can’t go wrong with black.
customer_reviews.author: Kikki

customer_reviews.title: Not a true shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I never deliberately like to give negative reviews unless 100% true..I am Running for the past 36 years.. The size on the Asics Gel Kayona 25 states 41.5 euro UK SIZE 7 . They feel and look like a size 8.. i even compared them to Saucony Hurricane size 7.. the Kayonas are visibly longer..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John P Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfy, so good I have been using them almost every day. I didn't do much in them (just walking and some running), however after 2 hours of playing basketball in them they started coming apart: the glue wasn't holding them together anymore: the sole in particular.
customer_reviews.author: claudio

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: These are a great big bulky shoe. I am a bit overweight and i got pain in my heel from running with these. They are also not very tightly fit around your foot.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Buy this make every year. Always good quality. Run a lot of half marathons and a few marathons. Always comfortable.No blisters as yet! Would recommend this make.
customer_reviews.author: carol maull

customer_reviews.title: Asics shoes getting stiff and hard
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is much more hard compared to my previous asics gel cumulus 17.But I note that this is a trend with even the latest gel cumulus 20.Not as comfortable and lighter as before.
customer_reviews.author: vin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jogging shoes
customer_reviews.text: Because of my age, I normally experience a bit of pain at ankles, knees and elsewhere. I bought those shoes after examining the reviews. They are really very good and I jog with hardly any pain at all. I normally use size 9. I followed the advice from the reviews and bought 1 size up, which is size 10. It fits perfectly lovely and reignited my passion for running
customer_reviews.author: Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: My sixth pair!
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in Gel-Kayno shoes for years. I'm now on my 6th pair! They fit well and keep me injury free.
customer_reviews.author: Martyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for serious runners.
customer_reviews.text: Husband very happy with these. He’s a very good runner and swears these are the most comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe for over-pronator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this same make for my husband for many years - recommended initially by his running club (over pronator gait). He wouldn't wear any other make - worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The shoe performs as per all the online reviews. It is a really nice pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lim

customer_reviews.title: The all rounder
customer_reviews.text: I tried Brooks Ghost 11, I tried Nike air Max TN, ASICS cayano 25 looks and feels just perfect. Nice grip, awesome stability, superb cushioning and forward energy and did I mention? It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kos Lykos

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I loved 24s and bought 25s as replacement after 24s were worn off. They fit the same way even though someone says they are bit wider After first 50km in them I can say - if you had 24s, these are just the same... I recommend them 👍
customer_reviews.author: Juraj Tlsty

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer very comfortable and fit perfectly with good support for distance running.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: A very nice light weight comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: A very nice light weight comfortable shoe, great for running short and mid distances, really responsive and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cushioning
customer_reviews.text: the shoe just fits perfectly. It actually exceeded my expectations. Much far better than the Kayana 24.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Came to Latvia in 2 weeks. Tested shoes 2 times. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Pjotrs Dusevskis

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Strange fit that gave pins and needles. Also after only 50 runs one of the shoelace holes broke and now useless.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the heavier rnner
customer_reviews.text: Yet another great set of running shoes from Ascics. I have nothing else for around 11 years.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best trainers I have ever owned. Fifth pair of ASICS but these were worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MR BEN RIMMER

customer_reviews.title: Tend to be slightly smaller than size for me, so I buy next size up with Asics.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable firm fitting shoes, which I've been using for over 5yrs now, and can't see any reason to alter the make,or model. They cost a bit more, but worth the extra. I have uk 10's, and wish I could manage with 9.5, as someone on preloved was selling a new unworn pair in the box for 85 pounds, but that's life.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: ASICS are quality. Especially the kayano 25. Much improved on the 24’s.
customer_reviews.author: John Cochrane

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Kayano 25 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The GEL-KAYANO 25 is a lightweight shoe designed for long distance rides. This iconic street racing shoe has accumulated over 20 years of success, helping the overpronators to maintain stability and comfort over long distances. The last kilometer will be as comfortable as the first, thanks to the excellent Flytefoam cushioning midsole that helps the shoes recover shape after impact. This means that the greater the rotation of the foot, the better the stability will be.\nThe shoe has been improved with a range of new features, including a newly designed upper using a jacquard net for improved fit. Optimized fit and stability thanks to the metaclutch technology for excellent heel hold, a new heel lining for maximum comfort and a new medial support system, together with a more spacious tip, make the GEL-KAYANO 25 extremely comfortable for run great distances.
feature_bullets: Minimal friction thanks to the seamless construction.
Gel high-performance system absorbs hard impact.
Mesh functional material for the perfect fit.
Flex notches for a more efficient stepping cycle.
